report.title: Sample species list for download
report.description: A report which lists all Pantheon species in a sample along with trait data, optimised for download.
report.query: select distinct #columns# from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlpref on cttlpref.id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id left join pantheon.species_index si on si.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# #filters#

param.name: taxon_group_id
param.description: ID of taxon group to filter to

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join cache_samples_functional s on s.website_id=o.website_id and s.survey_id=o.survey_id and s.id=o.sample_id and s.id in (#sample_id#)
join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.id and sle.scratchpad_list_id in (#sample_id#)

param.name: trait_attr_id
param.description: Trait attribute id to filter to species having this trait.
param.join: join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values filtv on filtv.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttlpref.id and filtv.deleted=false and filtv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#trait_attr_id#

param.name: parent_trait_term_id
param.join: join cache_termlists_terms t_trait on t_trait.id=filtv.int_value join cache_termlists_terms t_trait_p on t_trait_p.id=t_trait.parent_id and t_trait_p.id in (#parent_trait_term_id#) join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_trait_p on av_trait_p.int_value=t_trait_p.id and av_trait_p.taxa_taxon_list_id=filtv.taxa_taxon_list_id

param.name: grandparent_trait_term_id
param.join: join cache_termlists_terms t_trait_gp on t_trait_gp.id=t_trait_p.parent_id and t_trait_gp.id in (#grandparent_trait_term_id#) join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_trait_gp on av_trait_gp.int_value=t_trait_gp.id and av_traitg_p.taxa_taxon_list_id=filtv.taxa_taxon_list_id

param.name: duplicates
param.where: case '#sample_type#' when 'scratchpad' then cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id in ( select cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.id where sle.scratchpad_list_id in (#sample_id#) group by preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id having count(distinct sle.id)>1 ) else cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id in ( select preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id from cache_occurrences_functional where sample_id in (#sample_id#) group by preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id having count(*)>1 ) end
